title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 320.4 - Convening of the council
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 320.4 - Convening of the council

State Regulations

The Advisory Council for the New York State and local

Retirement Systems shall convene periodically at the request of the

Comptroller. The members of the council shall be entitled to reimbursement for
their actual and necessary expenses, but they shall receive no compensation for
their services. Notes

320.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
